title: Ring Ring - Novel Updates
tags: Caring Protagonist   Different Social Status   Drugs   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heroes   Kind Love Interests   Knights   Late Romance   Love Triangles   Lovers Reunited   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Pharmacist   Politics   Summoned Hero   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Mikuni Tsukasa   三国司
description:
3 years ago, a university student named Shiori took care of a knight who was strangely transported to Japan.

Although he managed to return to his world, but this time, for some reason it was Shiori’s turn to appear in an unfamiliar world.

With no one to rely on, Shiori meant to meet with the knight, but in this world, he had become a hero…>
